definition.name: Toaster
definition.description: A customizable toast notification component that wraps the Sonner toast library with theme support. It provides consistent styling that matches the application's theme and allows for displaying various types of notifications (success, error, info, etc.) with customizable appearance.

properties.description: Extends all props from Sonner's Toaster component

theme.description: The theme to use for the toasts. Inherited from the application theme context.

interactions: Toasts can be dismissed by clicking the close button or waiting for the auto-dismiss timeout
Action buttons within toasts can be clicked to trigger custom callbacks
Multiple toasts stack in the specified position
definition.visualLayout: The toasts appear as notification cards with customizable positions (default is bottom-right). Each toast includes a title, optional description, and action buttons with themed styling.
definition.implementationNotes: This component uses the next-themes hook for theme management and applies consistent styling through CSS classes. It extends the Sonner toast library's functionality while maintaining the application's design system.
